data.eml:eml: The position of the Leptoscelini and other taxonomic changes within the family Coreidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Packauskas, Richard J. (2008): The position of the Leptoscelini and other taxonomic changes within the family Coreidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera). Zootaxa 1696: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180722
